summary: Updated the role-overlay description for the Creator card in index.html to reflect the podcast focus. Changed from a generic description about developing creative solutions to specifically mentioning the co-founding role of Light and Presence Beyond the Mic podcast and its mission to inspire believers.
current_status: Creator role overlay description updated in index.html to accurately reflect the podcast co-founding role. The description now highlights the faith-based podcast and its mission to encourage believers to walk in the light and presence of the Lord.
